alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 5:02PM CDT until April 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN NEVADA AND NORTHERN COLUMBIA COUNTIES... At 501 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stephens, or 8 miles north of McNeil, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Magnolia, Waldo, McNeil, Willisville, Bussey, Smithland, Mount Vernon, Young, Laughlin, Waterloo, Cornelius, College Hill, Lamartine and Medlock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
